GET /api/genres.description: serves an array of all genres

POST /api/genres.description: Adds a new genre to the database and responds with an object with the newly added created genre

GET /api/books/:book_id.description: Serves an object of specified book based on book_id and a review_count of this book

DELETE /api/books/:book_id.description: Deletes the book from the database and all of its reviews base on book id

GET /api/books/:book_id/reviews.description: Serves an array of review objects of specified book based on book_id

reviews.body: Maecenas faucibus mollis interdum. Donec id elit non mi porta gravida at eget metus. Cras justo odio, dapibus ac facilisis in, egestas eget quam.

POST /api/books/:book_id/reviews.description: Posts a new review to the specified book and serves an object with the new created review

PATCH /api/reviews/:review_id.description: Serves a review object with new updated rating and body

DELETE /api/reviews/:review_id.description: Deletes the review based on review id if you are the owner

POST /api/users.description: Posts a new user and serves an object with the new created user

GET /api/users/:username.description: Serves a user object matching the given username

PATCH /api/users/:username.description: Updates user information matching the given username

DELETE /api/users/:username.description: Deletes user matching the given username when authenticated and authorized

POST /api/users/login.description: Logs in a user and responds with a JWT token if successful

POST /api/users/logout.description: Logs out a user and invalidates the JWT token
